availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Stephen Frost and Nancy Frost. Father of Simeon Frost, William Frost, Joshua Frost, Joseph Frost, and Samuel Frost. Married to Amanda Frost. Farmer in Grainger County, Tennessee in 1850. Appointed postmaster in Cedar Ford, Union County, Kentucky on August 25, 1857. Farmer in Union County, Tennessee in 1860. Juror in the State V. William B. Chapman in May 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 14, p. 241. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 4, p. 443. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, #14, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
KYR-0001-021-0031.
